content:
https://lukelowrey.com/dotnet-email-guide-2021/


FluentEmail is an open-source .NET library (created by me but with lots of help) that helps you implement complete email sending functionality in your dotnet app in less than 10 minutes (probably). It features built in providers for the most popular email senders including SendGrid and Mailgun along with Razor or Liquid templates out of the box.
title: A complete guide to send email in .NET (2021)
